General.Name: Apollo Minerals Limited
General.Description: Apollo Minerals Limited engages in the exploration and development of mineral resources. Its flagship project is the 100% owned Kroussou zinc-lead project consisting of one prospecting license covering 986.5 square kilometers located in the Ngounié Province of Western Gabon. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Perth, Australia.

1.Name: Mr. Lachlan  Lynch AGIA, B.Com., C.A.
1.Title: CFO & Company Sec.
